Reeling, the process of taking out the silk filament from cocoons

Then

Now

Publications

The major publication of ISC is the scientific journal "Sericologia" and proceedings of the ISC Congresses
More Publications...
Newly designed Web site of International Sericultural Commission launched

The newly designed Website (www.inserco.org) of the International Sericultural Commission has been officially launched by Ms. Ishita Roy, Secretary General, ISC in a brief function held at the Head Quarter Office of the ISC on 25th September, 2013.

Meeting between Chairman, Bangladesh Sericulture Board and Secretary General, ISC

Mr. Manontosh Dhar, Chairman, Bangladesh Sericulture Board, Daka has been deputed by the Government of Bangladesh to visit the ISC HQs, Bangalore, India, for initiating the process of Bangladesh enrolling as a Member Country of ISC. A meeting between Mr. Dhar and the Secretary General was held on 14.08.2013 at the ISC HQs, Bangalore.

A high level DPR Korean delegation visits the HQs of ISC

A high level 5 member DPR Korean delegation headed by Mr. Kim Jong Bin, Director General, Sericultural and Silk Industry Guidance Bureau, Pyongyang and comprising members; Mr. Ri Chong, Director and Mr. Ri Chol Ho, Director from Sericultural and Silk Industry Guidance Bureau; Mr. Rim Myong Su, Managing Director, and Ms.

Silk Products

Silk has been intermingled with the life and culture of many civilizations in the world.  The silk garments are among the living examples of the excellent craftsmanship of the weavers.
